text:
Trouble brewing for Madonna?

Pop star Madonna, who is busy with her gruelling tours, is facing a rebellion from her children who are fed up with her busy schedule.

The teenagers — Rocco and Lourdes — are fed up with the Material Mum’s mixed messages —and they’re acting out on their frustration, say News.com.au reports.

The report said that the kids “crave stability” but their mother’s relentless touring schedule and “too controlling” nature has made that difficult.

The family is embroiled in a custody dispute between the songstress and her ex-husband Guy Ritchie, over their son Rocco. — ANI
title: 'Touring' Madonna's kids acting out against her
